properties.name: ai.ingest.allowed-extensions
properties.description: List of file extensions that are allowed to be ingested into the AI system. Can be provided as a YAML list or as a comma-separated string (for example: pdf, txt, md).

properties.name: ai.chat.max-history-size
properties.description: Maximum number of previous chat messages to keep and send to the AI model as conversation history.

properties.name: ai.chat.temperature
properties.description: Controls randomness of the AI responses. Lower values make replies more deterministic, higher values make them more creative.

properties.name: ai.chat.top-k
properties.description: Number of most relevant documents to retrieve and attach to the prompt when using AI retrieval (RAG).

properties.name: ai.chat.top-p
properties.description: Top-p (nucleus) sampling parameter. Limits token selection to the smallest set whose cumulative probability exceeds this value.

properties.name: ai.chat.repeat-penalty
properties.description: Penalty applied to repeated tokens to reduce repetitive or looping responses from the AI.

properties.name: ai.rag-advisor.top-k
properties.description: Number of most relevant documents to retrieve from the vector store and attach to the SearchRequest used by the RAG advisor.

properties.name: ai.rag-advisor.similarity-threshold
properties.description: Minimum similarity score required for a document to be included in the SearchRequest. Filters out low-relevance documents before they are attached to the RAG prompt.
